com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.ui

Class DynamicDropdown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.ui.Field
      • com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.ui.DynamicDropdown

  • public abstract class DynamicDropdown
extends Field
    Define a drop-down field, whose options can be retrieved dynamically at the runtime based on the value of other fields.
    Since:
    PPM9.3.0
